Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.streams.filters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStreamFilter
    This lets us make sub-classes that change can modify values in this way
    SLMathFilter
    A set of filters that uses algorithms from InputScaler that can be used as a StreamFilter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IStreamFilterGroup
    A simple class that lets you combine multiple stream filters into one stream filter
    JerkLimit
    This class lets you limit the jerk a stream of inputs
    MovingAverage
    Simple implementation of an Simple Moving Average
    OnDerivative
    This class lets you take a simple filter like "x * 0.5" and apply it to the derivative of the IStream.
    RateLimit
    This class lets you rate limit a stream of inputs That means that the value can not change more than a specified amount in one update
    RollingAverage
    Simple implementation of an Exponential Moving Average
    TimedRateLimit
    This class lets you rate limit a stream of inputs where the values are limited based on time passed
